data.title: Carol Sue Jones Jackson

data.text:
Carol Sue Jones Jackson was born March 10, 1956 in Waynesboro, Tennessee, the daughter of the late Delano and Nadine Long Jones. Mrs. Jackson was a disabled school bus driver and a member of the Upper Green River Baptist Church. She was united in marriage to Michael Jackson who preceded her in death.

Mrs. Jackson departed this life on Saturday, March 13, 2021 at Wayne Medical Center in Waynesboro, Tennessee at the age of 65 Years, 3 Days.

She is survived by a son, Josh Crews of Waynesboro, TN; two grandsons, Dustin Crews and Caleb Crews; great-granddaughter, Lillie Jane Crews; brother, Roger Jones, all of Waynesboro, TN.
